definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Air-cooled, shifting belt drive, splash lubrication.
sentences.chinese: 風冷，移動式，皮帶傳動，飛濺潤滑。

sentences.english: Uses two level of belt transmissions, the transmission is steady, the service is convenient.
sentences.chinese: 採用二級皮帶傳動，傳動平穩，維護方便。

sentences.english: Flexible belt drive - allows easy speed changes.
Uses the second-level belt tramission, the tramission is steady, the service is convenient.
sentences.chinese: 採用二級皮帶傳動，傳動平穩，維修方便。

sentences.english: In the absence of friction belted machinery would not be used.
sentences.chinese: 沒有摩擦力，皮帶傳動的機器就無法使用。
